Newbie Guide:
Usually, when several people hunt together, they form a party. You can join a party by using Invite at Action Tab(ALT + C) in "Character Info." First, click on the person you wish to invite into your party, then click the Invite icon. Perhaps you should simply join a party to understand how it works.
If you have any difficulty with a party, you can click Party Matching at Action Tab in Character Info. You may also use Invite, Whisper or other useful commands from this window.
You should decide whether you want to travel alone or together with others. If you feel comfortable going it alone, think about how you will support yourself. If you prefer community life, think how you could lead a party.
"I'd like to travel alone."
"I'd like to travel in a party."
